Title: Annual Events
Description: GEC Patan organizes a range of events throughout the academic year, including annual festivals – Sports Week, fresher parties, and Navratri celebrations. These events provide students with opportunities to showcase their talents and engage with peers, enriching their college experience.

Title: Student Organizations
Description: The campus hosts various student groups such as the National Service Scheme (NSS) and Fit India Group. These organizations coordinate numerous activities, including sports tournaments and cultural programs, promoting leadership and community involvement among students.

Title: Thalessemia Test Camp
Description: While specific details about thalassemia test camps at GEC Patan are not readily available, the college is known for its commitment to social welfare initiatives. Regular blood donation camps are organized on campus, reflecting the institution's dedication to community health and student awareness.

Title: SSIP 2.0 sensitization program
Description: The SSIP 2.0 Sensitization Program aims to create COMMITTEE DETAILS awareness among students, faculty, and stakeholders about the Student Startup and Innovation Policy (SSIP) 2.0. This initiative enhances the innovation ecosystem by providing financial, technical, and mentorship support for student-led projects, startups, and research. The program educates participants about funding opportunities, prototyping assistance, and industry collaborations. It also highlights advancements from SSIP 1.0, focusing on scalability, intellectual property rights (IPR), and commercialization. Through workshops, seminars, and interactive sessions, the sensitization program encourages students to actively participate in innovation and entrepreneurship, driving technological progress and self-reliance in Gujarat and beyond. 120 students of First year including all branches have participated in it.

Title: Career Guidance Seminar
Description: The job study and business-related information provided. Also familiarize with government job portal. The 104 students were present and Feedback Obtained. The seminar aims to provide engineering students with a clear roadmap for their careers, helping them explore opportunities in jobs, higher studies, and entrepreneurship. The session will guide students in choosing the right career path based on their skills, interests, and market trends

Title: Mock interviews
Description: The National Service Scheme (NSS) is an Indian government-sponsored public service program conducted by the Department of Youth Affairs and Sports of the Government of India. Popularly known as NSS, the scheme was launched in Gandhiji's Centenary year, 1969. Aimed at developing student's personality through community service, NSS is a voluntary association of young people in Colleges, Universities and at +2 level working for a campus-community linkage.

The session will guide students in choosing the right career path based on their skills, interests, and market trends.

Title: Entrepreneurship after Engineering
Description: An Entrepreneurship after Engineering seminar is designed to aspiring students about entrepreneurs, and professionals to the fundamentals of entrepreneurship. It aims to develop an entrepreneurial mindset, provide insights into the startup ecosystem, and encourage innovation and self-employment. Also inform students about Government initiatives.

Title: Career Guidance Seminar
Description: The job study and business-related information provided. Also familiarize with government job portal. The 51 students were present and Feedback Obtained.

Title: Entrepreneurship Awareness Seminar
Description: An Entrepreneurship Awareness seminar is designed to introduce students, aspiring entrepreneurs, and professionals to the fundamentals of entrepreneurship. It aims to develop an entrepreneurial mindset, provide insights into the startup ecosystem, and encourage innovation and self-employment. Also inform students about Government initiatives.

Title: Alumni Meet 2022
Description: GEC Patan organized its Alumni Meet 2022, reuniting graduates from various batches to rekindle memories and strengthen professional networks. The event included interactive sessions, sharing of experiences, and cultural programs.

Title: Alumni Meet 2024
Description: The Alumni Meet 2024 at GEC Patan, graced by Chief Guest Dr. H. S. Patel, celebrated lasting bonds and achievements. Highlights included industry discussions, student-alumni interactions, alumni felicitations, and cultural events. The event fostered connection, inspiration, and pride among graduates, students, and faculty, strengthening the GEC Patan community spirit.

Title: Alumni Meet 2025
Description: The Alumni Meet 2025 at GEC Patan, graced by Chief Guest Dr. K. B. Judal, Principal of GEC Palanpur, focused on connecting alumni across generations. With career mentorship, startup showcases, and tech talks, the event strengthened alumni-institute ties and inspired students through valuable real-world insights and experiences.

Title: PRAGATI 2025
Description: PRAGATI 2025, the grand annual cultural fest of GEC Patan, was celebrated with unmatched enthusiasm on 5th April 2025. Featuring vibrant performances, student honors, and a tribute to Indian heritage, the event symbolized unity, talent, and tradition—making it a memorable evening for students, faculty, and alumni alike.

Title: THANGHANAAT 2024
Description: Thanghanaat 2024 lit up the GEC Patan campus with colors, beats, and unstoppable energy! Held on 9th March, this grand Navratri celebration by the Gymkhana Cultural Committee brought students together in dazzling traditional attire for a night of Garba, joy, and cultural unity. Truly, an unforgettable evening of dance and celebration!

Title: Personal Development Training Camp 2024
Description: Personality Development Camp 2024, organized by GTU from 18th to 21st July at Somnath Sanskrit University, offered GEC Patan students a transformative experience. Through leadership sessions, cultural exchanges, spiritual insights, and talent showcases, the camp nurtured confidence, creativity, and values—shaping future-ready individuals with purpose and positivity.

Title: Basic Rock Climbing Camp 2024
Description: Basic Rock Climbing Camp 2024, held at SVIM Mount Abu from 16th–25th November, empowered GEC Patan students through adventure and discipline. Organized by GTU, the camp featured expert-led training in trekking, climbing, and survival skills—fostering physical fitness, confidence, and resilience through real-world challenges and team spirit.

Title: THANGHANAAT 2023
Description: Thanghanaat 2023, GEC Patan’s spirited Navratri celebration, was held on 16th October with energetic Garba, Dandiya, and a soulful Aarti. Students and faculty in traditional attire danced in unity, filling the campus with joy, devotion, and cultural pride—creating a memorable evening of festivity, faith, and togetherness.

Title: Personality Development Training Camp 2023
Description: Personality Development Camp 2023, organized by GTU at Somnath Sanskrit University from 7th–10th May, empowered selected GEC Patan students through expert-led sessions on leadership, communication, and career skills. The camp fostered confidence, personal growth, and clarity of purpose—leaving a lasting impact on participants' academic and professional journeys.

Title: Drama Training Camp 2023
Description: Drama Training Camp 2023, organized by GTU from 11th–17th May at Somnath Sanskrit University, gave GEC Patan students immersive exposure to acting, stagecraft, and expression. With expert mentorship and live performances, the camp boosted creativity, confidence, and cultural understanding—shaping students into expressive, confident, and collaborative performers.

Title: Lok Nritya Training Camp 2024
Description: Lok Nritya Training Camp 2024, held from 21st–27th July at Somnath Sanskrit University, celebrated Gujarat’s vibrant folk traditions. Four GEC Patan students mastered Garba, Raas, Hudo, and more under expert guidance. The camp nurtured cultural pride, artistic expression, and unity—earning praise for their authentic, energetic stage performances.

Title: Lok Nritya Training Camp 2023
Description: GEC Patan students participated in GTU’s Lok Nritya Training Camp 2023 from April 11–17 at Somnath Sanskrit University, Veraval. The camp offered immersive training in folk dances like Garba and Hudo. Students gained rhythm, stage skills, and deep cultural insights—honoring Gujarat’s rich traditions through joyful learning and vibrant performances.
